data.title: iPad - Networks
data.meta_description: iPad can connect to certain LTE and 5G networks in the U.S., Canada, Japan, Germany, UK, Australia, Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore, and many more.
data.text:
Find the right iPad model for

5G and LTE in your country or region.

iPad models with 5G let you download movies, stream higher‑quality video, and use FaceTime in HD at superfast speeds. And all iPad models with Wi‑Fi + Cellular connect to fast LTE networks around the world. Different countries require different models. Here you can find which works with 5G or LTE service in your country. For more details, contact your carrier.

See if your carrier supports 5G
